hero.name: Sabeeh Hassan
hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.description: I'm a frontend-focused software engineer with expertise in React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I build responsive, high-performance web applications with clean code and intuitive user interfaces.

about.name: Sabeeh Hassan Farooqui
about.title: About Me
about.introPara1: My name is Sabeeh Hassan Farooqui. I am a professional and enthusiastic frontend developer with hands-on expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. I am a quick learner with a self-learning attitude, always eager to explore new technologies and solve complex problems.
about.introPara2: I recently completed an internship at Codesy Consulting where I contributed to a production-level Next.js application, building responsive UI components and working on AI-powered features. I'm passionate about creating intuitive user interfaces, writing clean and reusable code, and delivering high-performance web experiences.
about.introPara3: My core strength lies in JavaScript-based development, and I enjoy working with React, Next.js, and TypeScript to build scalable applications. I'm actively seeking junior frontend opportunities where I can contribute to AI-enabled products and continue growing as a developer.

experience.title: Experiences
experience.job1Description: Completed my first internship at Codesy Consulting, where I worked on a Next.jsâ€“based web development project. I contributed to UI component development, responsive layouts, and feature implementation while gaining hands-on experience with modern web technologies and best development practices.
experience.job2Description: Worked on building responsive web applications using React and TypeScript. Collaborated with design team to implement pixel-perfect UIs and optimize application performance.

contact.title: Contact With Me
contact.subtitle: If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me. I am open to any work opportunities that align with my skills and interests.

contact.availabilityDescription: Currently open to frontend development opportunities and exciting projects.
